title: Fox Campaigns
author: Fox Campaigns
created_time: September 15, 2022, 04:23:03 PMLast edit: September 15, 2022, 04:51:37 PM by Fox Campaigns
content: We aim to disrupt the internet by eliminating the current barriers. Maximus Tech is building the most reliable internet ecosystem that ensures immutable security for the user’s data regardless of products or services.Learn more about the Maximus Coin1. Bounty Campaign Starts on: 16 September - 13 October (4 weeks)2. $8000 worth of MXZ tokens will be distributed after 3 months when the bounty is over.3. Complete tasks and make reports every week in this thread! 4. Connect with Maximus in social media;- Twitter: https://twitter.com/maximustechmxz- Telegram: https://t.me/maximustechmxz- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/maximustechmxz- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/maximustechmxz- Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/maximustechmxz- Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/user/maximustechmxz- Medium: https://medium.com/@maximustechmxz- YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKRvOs3VBHQ92jF9V11s7IA- Learn more about Maximus Coin: https://maximuscoin.io/5. Do not leave Maximus groups before the end of this campaign.6. Maximus team reserves the right to adjust the reward amount, depending on the number of applicants in each of the bounty campaigns.7. Any application with improper information will be disqualified without notice (i.e., Multiple alts, scam, spams etc...)8. Please check your wallet address which you submit, this cannot be changed till the end of the bounty.9. Tokens will be distributed depending on the quality of your work.10. Spammers, cheaters, bots, and similar participants will be banned immediately!11. Follow all the bounty groups/channels to get support and to stay updated;- Maximus Bounty: https://t.me/maximusbounty- Foxcampaigns Group: https://t.me/foxcampaigns- Foxcampaigns Channel: https://t.me/foxannouncementsNote:If you are disqualified for any reason, you will NOT receive any bounty rewards.All rights reserved by the Maximus Tech team. The team can make any changes to rules or terms and conditions, if applicable.Maximus Tech team has right to substitute MXZ with Stablecoins (USDT/ BUSD or other).By signing up for the bounty, you're accepting these above terms.Code:Proof of authentication;Telegram username:Campaigns applied:BSC wallet address:$8,000 worth of MXZ tokens will be distributed in this bounty. Only participants with quality work(s) will be rewarded;- Signature Campaign: 40%- Content Campaign:  30%- Twitter campaign: 22.5%- Reddit Campaign: 7.5%Tokens:-1 - 10 stakes depending on the content quality (video/article).Rules:- Videos must have at least 200 views to qualify.- We accept original videos only with at least 3 minutes.- Only English language is accepted in videos and articles.- Write a good description about Maximus Coin in your video. - Videos with no user's voice will not be accepted.- Attach Maximus Coin links in your video description and articles.- Only YouTube videos will be accepted!- 2 videos and 2 articles per person are allowed.- Articles must have at least 50 views to qualify.- We accept original articles only with at least 500 words.- Submit articles on Medium, Steem, Linkedin, ReadCash.  - Visit maximuscoin.io to learn more about it and write your articles.JOIN HERE   -   SPREADSHEETS Stakes:- 300 to 1000 followers: 4 stakes per week- 1001 to 2500 followers: 8 stakes per week- 2501 to 5500 followers: 12 stakes per week- 5501 to 10,000 followers: 16 stakes per week- 10,000+ followers: 20 stakes per weekRules:1. Have at least 300 followers to participate.2. Must follow Maximus Coin Twitter account: @maximustechmxz3. Make 1 post and 1 repost, per day. Submit report weekly to receive stakes.4. Minimum of 10 posts per week (5 tweets, 5 retweets)5. Use these hashtags; #maximustech #mxz #decentralizedcloudstorage #foxcampaigns #web3 #cryptocommunity #blockchain #cryptoJOIN HERE   -   SPREADSHEETS Code:[ Twitter Report ]Twitter Profile Link:Week #:Tweet Link #1:Tweet Link #2:Tweet Link #3:Tweet Link #4:Tweet Link #5:Retweet Link #1: Retweet Link #2:Retweet Link #3:Retweet Link #4:Retweet Link #5:Stakes:- 300 to 1000 followers: 4 stakes per week- 1001 to 2500 followers: 8 stakes per week- 2501 to 5500 followers: 12 stakes per week- 5501 to 10,000 followers: 16 stakes per week- 10,000+ followers: 20 stakes per weekRules:1. Have at least 300 Karma to participate.2. Must follow Maximus Coin Reddit account: @maximustechmxz3. Make 1 post and 1 crosspost, per day. Submit report weekly to receive stakes.4. Minimum of 10 posts per week (5 posts, 5 reposts).5.
